name: node-chillog
description: Gelf log formatter for nodeJS and print out to console.

scripts.test: JUNIT_REPORT_PATH=test-results/results.xml JUNIT_REPORT_STACK=1 istanbul cover --report cobertura _mocha -- --timeout 60000 --reporter mocha-jenkins-reporter || true

author: lagilaper <pengen.makan.nasi@gmail.com>
